front.title: Using Identity as Raw Public Key in Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS)

author.organization: Shenzhen Olym Info. Security Tech. Ltd.

abstract.t: This document specifies the use of identity as a raw public key in Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS). The TLS protocol procedures are kept unchanged, but signature algorithms are extended to support Identity-based signature (IBS). A few Identity-based signature algorithms from different standard organizations are supported in the current version.
